item.title: Pinterest营收预期下调，数字广告市场竞争激烈；股价暴跌
item.description: Pinterest周四公布的季度营收预测低于市场预期，凸显出这家图片分享平台在与财力雄厚平台争夺广告收入时持续面临的困境，其股价在盘后交易中下跌12%。【原文：Pinterest forecast first-quarter revenue below estimates on Thursday, underscoring the image-sharing platform's ongoing struggle to compete for advertising dollars against deep-pocketed platforms, sending its shares down 12% in extended trading.】

item.title: 罗库预测年度营收超预期，股价上涨
item.description: 罗库周四发布的年度营收预测超出华尔街预期，该公司押注数字广告市场将反弹，且流媒体行业正加速转向广告支持模式。【原文：Roku forecast annual revenue above Wall Street estimates on Thursday, betting on a rebound in the digital advertising market and a broader shift to ad-based streaming.】

item.title: Rivian预计2026年交付量将大幅增长，主要得益于更小巧、更实惠的R2 SUV车型的推出。
item.description: Rivian Automotive周四预测，2026年交付量将激增53%，这一预期与华尔街的预测基本吻合，主要得益于该公司更实惠的R2 SUV车型的推出。【原文：Rivian Automotive forecast a 53% jump in 2026 deliveries on Thursday, tracking closely with Wall Street expectations, driven by the roll out of the electric vehicle maker's more affordable R2 SUVs.】

item.title: 爱彼迎因高端租赁需求强劲，营收预期超出市场预期
item.description: 爱彼迎周四预测其第一季度营收将超出华尔街预期，这家度假租赁公司正依靠高端预订来应对注重成本的客户需求放缓的局面。【原文：Airbnb forecast first-quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates on Thursday, as the vacation rental company banks on premium bookings to counter easing demand from cost-conscious customers.】

item.title: 应用材料公司预测季度业绩超出预期；股价大涨
item.description: 应用材料公司周四预测第二季度营收和利润将超出市场预期，押注人工智能处理器需求的激增将推动其芯片制造设备的销售，其股价在盘后交易中上涨9%。【原文：Applied Materials forecast second-quarter revenue and profit above market estimates on Thursday, betting on a boom in demand for AI processors to help drive sales of its chipmaking equipment, sending its shares up 9% in extended trading.】

item.title: 独家：沙特支持的米达德公司与卢克石油就受制裁资产签署条款清单，尚待批准
item.description: 据三位知情人士透露，沙特支持的米达德能源公司已签署条款清单，计划收购受制裁的俄罗斯卢克石油公司资产。在与包括私募巨头凯雷集团在内的竞争对手角逐中，该交易需获得美国监管机构批准。【原文：Saudi-backed Midad Energy has signed a term sheet to acquire Russia’s sanctioned Lukoil assets in a high-stakes contest against rivals including private equity giant Carlyle Group , with the deal contingent on U.S. regulatory approval, according to three people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 澳大利亚西太平洋银行第一季度利润因贷款和存款增长而上升
item.description: 澳大利亚西太平洋银行周五表示，受客户存款和贷款稳健增长推动，其第一季度基本净利润较前两个季度平均水平增长6%。【原文：Australia's Westpac Banking Corp said on Friday its first-quarter underlying net profit rose 6% versus the average of the previous two quarters, driven by solid growth across customer deposits and loans.】

item.title: 派拉蒙瞄准彭特沃特资本的哈尔博沃，欲为华纳兄弟董事会席位争取人选
item.description: 派拉蒙影业正考虑让华纳兄弟探索公司的一位知名对冲基金经理兼投资者参选该公司董事会席位，试图阻挠其与奈飞拟议的合并计划。派拉蒙正与彭特沃特资本管理公司创始人马修·哈尔博威进行磋商，若该公司决定在华纳兄弟董事会展开争夺战，他有望在今年晚些时候成为潜在董事候选人。哈尔博威向路透社证实了这一消息。【原文：Paramount Skydance is eyeing a prominent hedge fund manager and investor in Warner Bros Discovery to run for a seat on the media company's board to try and scuttle its proposed tie-up with Netflix. Paramount is holding discussions with Matthew Halbower, the founder of Pentwater Capital Management, to be a potential director-candidate later this year if the company pursues a board fight at Warner Bros, he confirmed to Reuters.】

item.title: 德国央行警告称，美联储独立性的丧失可能推高全球通胀
item.description: 德国联邦银行行长约阿希姆·纳格尔周三表示，美国联邦储备委员会丧失独立性可能加剧全球各国央行面临的政治压力，并推高所有国家的通胀水平。【原文：A loss of independence at the U.S. Federal Reserve could raise political pressure on central banks all around the world and boost inflation for everyone, Bundesbank President Joachim Nagel said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 礼来公司斥资15亿美元囤积减肥药，静待FDA审批决定
item.description: 礼来公司周四提交的文件显示，其实验性口服减肥药上市前库存价值达15亿美元，美国食品药品监督管理局预计将于4月作出审批决定。【原文：Eli Lilly had $1.5 billion worth of pre-launch inventory of its experimental oral weight-loss drug, a filing showed on Thursday, ahead of an expected decision by the U.S. Food and Drug Administration in April.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局称，梅赛德斯-奔驰因存在起火隐患将在美国召回11,895辆汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局周四表示，梅赛德斯-奔驰因高压电池可能发生内部故障，在停车或行驶时存在起火风险，将在美国召回11,895辆汽车。【原文：Mercedes-Benz is recalling 11,895 vehicles in the U.S. over high-voltage batteries that can fail internally and pose a fire risk while parked or driving, the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Thursday.】

item.title: 巴西的罗布斯塔等甘蔗型咖啡生产商正向新领域拓展
item.description: 行业领袖、研究人员和官员表示，随着价格上涨推动种植热情，卡内福拉咖啡品种（包括科尼隆和罗布斯塔）正在巴西传统上几乎不种植或完全不种植该作物的州份扩张。【原文：Canephora coffee varieties, including conilon and robusta, are expanding in Brazilian states that traditionally produce little to none of the crops, as elevated prices drive interest, industry leaders, researchers and officials said.】

item.title: 摩根大通商业与投资银行任命哈拉米什为首席运营官，负责领导人工智能战略，备忘录显示。
item.description: 据路透社获得的一份内部备忘录显示，摩根大通商业与投资银行已任命内部人士盖伊·哈拉米什担任首席运营官，负责统筹该部门的数据与人工智能战略。【原文：JPMorgan Chase's commercial and investment bank has appointed insider Guy Halamish as chief operating officer to oversee data and AI strategy across the division, according to an internal memo seen by Reuters.】

item.title: Anthropic在最新融资轮估值达3800亿美元
item.description: 人工智能初创公司Anthropic周四宣布，其最新融资轮已筹集300亿美元资金，本轮融资由D. E. Shaw Ventures、ICONIQ和MGX等投资者共同领投，使这家Claude聊天机器人的制造商估值达到3800亿美元。【原文：AI startup Anthropic said on Thursday it has raised $30 billion in its latest funding round, which was co-led by investors including D. E. Shaw Ventures, ICONIQ and MGX, valuing the Claude chatbot maker at $380 billion.】

item.title: 独家：知情人士称，康卡斯特旗下天空电视台与英国独立电视台22亿美元并购谈判进展放缓
item.description: 知情人士透露，康卡斯特旗下天空集团与独立电视台就收购其广播频道及流媒体平台的谈判近几周已放缓，因收购华纳兄弟探索公司的争夺战正扰乱整个行业格局。【原文：Comcast-owned Sky's talks with ITV about buying its broadcast channels and streaming platform have slowed in recent weeks, three people with knowledge of the matter said, as the battle to buy Warner Bros Discovery disrupts the industry.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称欧盟拟简化泛欧交易审批流程
item.description: 知情人士称，欧洲企业若想通过收购扩大规模以增强与非欧盟竞争对手的竞争力，若交易涉及泛欧洲层面，则更可能获得监管机构批准。【原文：European companies looking to build scale through acquisitions to better compete with non-EU rivals could increase their chances of winning regulatory approval if deals are on a pan-European level, people with direct knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 嘉吉公司将关闭威斯康星州牛肉加工厂，裁员221人
item.description: 美国农业企业嘉吉公司将永久关闭其位于威斯康星州密尔沃基市的牛肉加工厂，裁撤221个岗位。根据该公司向州政府提交的文件显示，这是美国肉类加工企业成本持续攀升背景下最新关闭的牛肉加工厂。【原文：U.S. agribusiness Cargill will permanently close its beef processing facility in Milwaukee, Wisconsin, and eliminate 221 jobs, according to a filing with the state, the latest U.S. beef plant to be shuttered amid rising costs for meatpackers.】

item.title: 欧盟因谷歌搜索广告拍卖行为对其展开调查
item.description: 欧盟反垄断监管机构正就谷歌在欧洲销售搜索广告的行为展开调查，路透社获得的一封致广告商的信函显示。【原文：EU antitrust regulators are investigating Alphabet unit Google over the sale of search advertisements in Europe, a letter to advertisers seen by Reuters showed.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称，帕洛阿尔托公司因担心北京报复而未将中国与中国黑客行动挂钩
item.description: 据两位知情人士透露，Palo Alto Networks公司上周曝光了一起全球网络间谍活动，但该公司选择不将中国与该活动挂钩，因担心这家网络安全公司或其客户可能面临北京方面的报复。【原文：Palo Alto Networks opted not to tie China to a global cyberespionage campaign the firm exposed last week over concerns that the cybersecurity company or its clients could face retaliation from Beijing, according to two people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 据彭博社报道，谷歌因搜索广告定价问题再遭欧盟反垄断调查
item.description: 据彭博社周四报道，欧盟正对谷歌展开调查，因其涉嫌非法操纵搜索引擎广告价格。【原文：Google is being investigated by the European Union over concerns it is illegally rigging the cost of advertising on its search engine, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 欧洲企业前景好转，但盈利预期下滑
item.description: 最新LSEG I/B/E/S预测数据显示，欧洲企业健康状况前景已有所改善。随着迄今为止财报季表现优于预期，欧洲蓝筹股指数已攀升至新高。【原文：The outlook for European corporate health has improved, the latest LSEG I/B/E/S forecasts showed on Thursday, as European blue-chip indices hit highs on the back of a better-than-anticipated earnings season so far.】

item.title: 华尔街监管机构将恢复部分裁减岗位，主席表示
item.description: 美国金融监管机构负责人周四向国会表示，在去年应白宫要求大幅裁员后，华尔街顶级监管机构正着手恢复部分员工编制。【原文：Wall Street's top regulator is working to restore some of its workforce following last year's deep cuts at the behest of the White House, the agency's chief told Congress on Thursday.】

item.title: 葡萄牙批准对儿童使用社交媒体实施限制
item.description: 葡萄牙议会周四在初审中通过一项法案，要求13至16岁青少年使用社交媒体须获得父母明确同意。这是欧洲首个实施此类限制的具体立法举措。【原文：Portugal's parliament on Thursday approved a bill, on its first reading, requiring explicit parental consent for children aged 13 to 16 to access social media, in one of the first concrete legislative moves in Europe to impose such restrictions.】

item.title: 押注盈利驱动的股市波动的期权交易大获丰收
item.description: 期权分析服务ORATS的数据显示，一种押注企业财报公布后股价将出现超预期波动的期权策略在本财报季表现异常出色。【原文：An options strategy that bets on stocks logging larger-than-expected moves on corporate results has performed unusually well this earnings season, data from options analytics service ORATS showed.】

item.title: 荷兰电信公司Odido遭黑客攻击，600万账户受影响
item.description: 荷兰T-Mobile前业务部门Odido周四表示，超过六百万账户的个人信息在一次黑客攻击中遭泄露，这是该国迄今为止规模最大的数据泄露事件之一。【原文：Odido, the former business of T-Mobile in the Netherlands, said on Thursday that personal information from more than six million accounts had been exposed in a hack, one of the largest such incidents in the country.】

item.title: 美国食品药品监督管理局批准更年期激素疗法标签变更
item.description: 美国食品和药物管理局周四表示，已批准对六种更年期激素疗法的标签进行修改，删除其中关于心血管疾病、乳腺癌和可能痴呆症风险的说明。【原文：The U.S. Food and Drug Administration said on Thursday it has approved labeling changes to six menopause hormone therapies to remove references to risks of cardiovascular disease, breast cancer, and probable dementia.】

item.title: 欧莱雅第四季度销售额跃升6%
item.description: 欧莱雅周四表示，其第四季度销售额增长6%，这得益于欧洲和北美地区对该集团护发产品和香水的强劲需求，抵消了北亚地区几乎停滞的增长。【原文：L'Oreal's fourth-quarter sales grew 6%, it said on Thursday, as strong demand for the group's haircare and perfumes in Europe and North America compensated for barely any growth in North Asia.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称，芝商所将在亚洲铝市场扩张中将台湾、香港仓库纳入交易范围
item.description: 知情人士向路透社透露，芝商所集团即将批准台湾和香港成为铝仓库地点。随着这家美国商品交易所加大对伦敦金属交易所（LME）在亚洲的挑战力度，此举具有重要意义。【原文：CME Group is set to approve Taiwan and Hong Kong as warehouse locations for aluminium, three sources with direct knowledge of the matter told Reuters, as the U.S. commodity exchange steps up its challenge to the London Metal Exchange (LME) in Asia.】

item.title: 育碧确认目标后，《刺客信条：克里夫》预订量强劲
item.description: 法国电子游戏发行商育碧周四确认了全年财务目标，此前受其旗舰游戏《刺客信条》系列推动，第三季度预订量超出公司预期。【原文：French video game publisher Ubisoft confirmed its full-year financial targets on Thursday after third-quarter bookings exceeded company forecasts, driven by its flagship "Assassin's Creed" franchise.】

item.title: 新任卡夫亨氏首席执行官面临艰难抉择：分拆还是加倍下注
item.description: 卡夫亨氏新任首席执行官史蒂夫·卡希兰面临艰难抉择：要么继续耗时耗力的分拆进程，要么在消费者信心低迷时期重振公司陷入困境的品牌。他无法两者兼顾。【原文：Kraft Heinz's new CEO Steve Cahillane was faced with a difficult choice. Either continue the time-consuming process of separating into two companies or revive the company's struggling brands during a time of weak consumer sentiment. He couldn't do both.】
